content: this pattern uses the c2c stitch perfect for the holidays materials needed worsted weight 4 yarn in grinchy green - approx 190 yds worsted weight 4 yarn in white - approx 65 yds worsted weight 4 yarn in red- approx 20 yds worsted weight 4 yarn in black - approx 8 yds worsted weight 4 yarn in yellow - small amount 6mm scissors tapestry needle hot glue gun
